subject: Bump to version 1.1.5
commitMessage:
Bump to version 1.1.5

Use upstream git repo instead of pristin-tar.

Also improve spec file.

Bug-Tizen: TC-1853
Change-Id: Id2c28054cdb20db846c0031aee5d1d00ef359e0b
Signed-off-by: Kévin THIERRY <kevin.thierry@open.eurogiciel.org>

comments.message: Uploaded patch set 1.
Patch Set 1: Verified+1
Patch Set 1: Code-Review+1

Patch Set 1: Code-Review-1

please fix upstream_branch
Patch Set 1: -Code-Review -Verified
Uploaded patch set 2.
Patch Set 2: Code-Review+1
Patch Set 2: Verified+1
Patch Set 2: Code-Review+2
Change has been successfully merged into the git repository.

Patch Set 2:

The SR (Submit Request) has been accepted to OBS Tizen:Common project.
- Package: mtdev
- Reviewer: jobol
- Comments: SR 31210 is set to accepted
- Git project: platform/upstream/mtdev
- Tag:submit/tizen_common/20141222.091700
- Request URL:https://build.tizen.org/request/show/31210

Patch Set 2:

The SR (Submit Request) has been accepted to OBS Tizen:IVI project.
- Package: zypper
- Reviewer: tizenrobot
- Comments: SR 31365 is set to accepted state. Your submission has been accepted into Tizen IVI project.
-
After rebuild your package(s) will end up in the latest IVI snapshot repositories:
i586 atom repository: https://download.tizen.org/snapshots/tizen/ivi/latest/repos/atom/
i586 emulator repository: https://download.tizen.org/snapshots/tizen/ivi/latest/repos/emulator/
-
You can find latest snapshot images in the latest IVI snapshot repository:
i586 EFI image: https://download.tizen.org/snapshots/tizen/ivi/latest/images/atom/ivi-efi-i586/
i586 MBR image: https://download.tizen.org/snapshots/tizen/ivi/latest/images/atom/ivi-mbr-i586/
i586 MBR emulator image: https://download.tizen.org/snapshots/tizen/ivi/latest/images/emulator/ivi-mbr-i586-emul/
-
Your package(s) will be included into the next daily release.
-
- Git project: platform/upstream/mtdev
- Tag:submit/tizen_ivi/20141225.222222
- Request URL:https://build.tizen.org/request/show/31365
